lines.text: You know the trouble with this business is it makes a man old before his time. You know I never did hear of a sheriff living to be a ripe old age, did you?
Sure. Ed Murdock. They didn't shoot him until he was 38.
Man's gotta fight to live in peace.
Claudius don't bluff. He's the fastest man with a gun I've ever seen.
As long as you're gettin' around to doin' some shooting you might as well have a gun with bullets in it.
[Jim takes the gun that they recovered from Dave Mosely]
Think you'll be able to use it?
Ever since I first heard you talking in your sleep.
[Jim walks away and mounts his horse]
You better make up your mind by the time you meet Claudius. He'll give you no chance to change it. Good luck.
